overview: Thousands of years ago, the green snake gradually gained enlightenment under Daoqing, and came to want to stay with Daoqing. However, because of its obsession with Daoqing, Daoqing entered the tribulation of reincarnation and suffered a lifetime of death. In order to resolve Daoqing’s calamity, the Green Snake has been searching for Daoqing’s reincarnation for hundreds of years...
title: Green Snake: The Fate of Reunion
